attributes.action: Enable police to issue Fixed Penalty Notices for the use of Fake/Altered ID.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enable police to issue Fixed Penalty Notices for the use of Fake/Altered ID for the purchase of age restricted products or attempts by individuals to gain entry to age restricted premises using Fake/Altered ID.
Theses are offenses under S1 of the Fraud Act and S25 of the ID cards act 2006. In an official reply from the Home Office there is no plan to let these offenses be dealt with by this method only the option of up to 2 years in prison is available to the police. I am trying to change the law to allow the offenders to receive a FPN & £80 fine.
